Event.name: Attempt_distant_interaction_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to interact with a relatively distant or indirectly accessible <fen>Target</fen> using some <fen>Instrument</fen> (which may be a body part, e.g. <ment>hand</ment>). The <fen>Agent</fen>'s ability to manipulate the <fen>Instrument</fen> and put it in the <fen>Target</fen> location is in question. The most common types of distant interaction involve an <fen>Agent</fen> attempting to move the <fen>Instrument</fen> ballistically so that it contacts the <fen>Target</fen> (e.g. Shooting_scenario), or an <fen>Agent</fen> attempting to direct an <fen>Instrument</fen> that enables perception at a <fen>Target_location</fen> to be examined.</def-root>

Arg.name: Target
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Target</fen> is the entity located in an indirectly accessible location relative to the <fen>Agent</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Outcome</fen> is the failure or success of an attempt. </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which an attempt occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which an attempt occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Depictive</fen> is a phrase which describes the <fen>Agent</fen> during the event.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The place where an attempt is made.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Agent</fen> makes the attempt.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time peiod over which the attempt or attempts take place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The reason for which the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to interact with the <fen>Target</fen></def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states. In addition, most expressions of <fen>Particular_iteration</fen> indicate which instance of the series is being referred to.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is independent of the the attempt of the <fen>Agent</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The object manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> in order to interact with the <fen>Target</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Target_location
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location that the <fen>Agent</fen> is attempting to access using the <fen>Instrument</fen>. </def-root>
